verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w corn|strong="H7668"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* said \w unto|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w ye|strong="H3426"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w another|strong="H7200"\w*?

\w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w*, \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w corn|strong="H7668"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: get \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w thither|strong="H8033"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w thence|strong="H8033"\w*; \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H4714"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*’s \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* brethren \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* \w corn|strong="H1250"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w those|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*.

\w We|strong="H5168"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w true|strong="H3651"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, \w thy|strong="H1121"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w spies|strong="H7270"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* said, \w We|strong="H3117"\w* \w thy|strong="H3117"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* brethren, \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w youngest|strong="H6996"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w our|strong="H5650"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1696"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H1931"\w*, \w That|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* I \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H1696"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*, \w Ye|strong="H1696"\w* \w are|strong="H3130"\w* \w spies|strong="H7270"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* put \w them|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* together into \w ward|strong="H4929"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* said \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*; \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* God:

\w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w bring|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* \w youngest|strong="H6996"\w* brother \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*; \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* verified, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*. \w And|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*.
